name: Rio Haryanto
introduction: Rio Haryanto (born 22 January 1993) is an Indonesian Formula One driver who formerly drove for Manor. He is Indonesia's first F1 driver. He raced in the first twelve races of the 2016 season, but after having a lack of sponsorship money, Manor put him under the role of a reserve driver, while his racing seat was taken by Renault's reserve driver Esteban Ocon starting from the Belgian Grand Prix.[1]
